author: Sophie Evans
title: Glamour model who promised to perform sex act on 19 MILLION voters wants to meet man with bionic penis
text:
News Glamour model who promised to perform sex act on 19 MILLION voters wants to meet man with bionic penis Paulo Saulino says it would be "great" if she could "put her skills to use" on Mohammed Abad, who was fitted with the £70,000 device in 2012 Share Paola Saulino promised to perform a sex act on more than 19million voters (Photo: Instagram) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
An Italian model who promised to perform a sex act on more than 19million voters wants to meet a British man with a bionic penis, it is reported. 
Paola Saulino says it "would be great" if she could "put her skills to use" on Mohammed Abad, who was fitted with the £70,000 prosthetic device in 2012. 
The 27-year-old says Mohammed's manhood might be "bigger and better" than the average penis and that they could have a "really fun experience" together. 
She believes their paths could meet in the UK, while she is on an X-rated tour. 
Paola hit the headlines after declaring she would give oral sex to everyone who rejected constitutional reforms in Italy's referendum last year. Paola says it "would be great" if she could "put her skills to use" on Mohammed Abad, who has a bionic penis (Photo: Phil Harris/Daily Mirror) The 27-year-old says Mohammed's manhood might be "bigger and better" than the average penis (Photo: Instagram/Paola Saulino) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
